summary: Unlocks every available achievement in Skyrim and its DLC.
descriptionHtml:
Places a stone in Whiterun next to the Shrine of Talos that unlocks all available achievements for Skyrim when activated.

Useful if you want/need to get a 100% completion rate if you don't own the DLC or achievements are bugging out.

USE AT YOUR OWN RISK. DON'T BLAME ME IF IT BACKFIRES.

To use this mod:

Download and install it. (Very simple, drop Achievements.esp and Achievements.bsa into your Data directory.)
Open Skyrim.
Go to the Shrine of Talos in Whiterun.
There will be four stones in front of it. One does the base (no DLC) achievements, the others do the DLC achievements. Look at the text displayed when you are about to interact with the stone in question to figure out which achievements will be unlocked.
Enjoy your achievements.

When you're finished, just uninstall it. (Again, simple. Remove the files that you placed in the Data directory during installation.)

This mod is also available on the Workshop:

http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=277368856
author: Just Creepus
